      Classes in edu.snu.onyx.runtime.common.message.grpc that implement MessageEnvironment 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GrpcMessageEnvironment
      This class is installed when every node, containing both driver and evaluator, has been started, and setup grpc environment to implement RPC semantics defined in edu.snu.onyx.runtime.common.message package.
